name: Initial Wave
description:
CONTROLS: WASD for movement and space for nitro (arrow keys and right shift for player 2). The game also supports two xbox 360 gamepads both on windows and mac

DISCLAIMER: This game was made as a student project that took around 3 weeks to make, so everything in the game is not ideal.

Game project made by 4 students from Stadin Ammattiopisto in Finland during fall 2018.

There are 3 races to complete and an open world to explore.  The city is in a neon synthwave styled aesthetic with music that goes with it. The city is full of different objects that can be destroyed including a gas station that blows up. There is also a customization feature where you can apply different paints to your vehicle.

The game also features split screen for local multiplayer with 2 players on the same keyboard or on seperate gamepads.
